name: secret-sword
caption: Secret Sword

effect.short: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Damage calculation always uses the target's [Defense]{mechanic:defense}, regardless of this move's damage class.

flavorText:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power
contained in the horn does physical damage to
the target.
